title: phy /chem
content: is physics cycle hard to score when compared to chem cycle?

comments.body: Maybe they are making chem cycle harder this year/equal difficulty as physics cycle  only physics isa was fucked whereas we are getting our asses gaped in esas which has 50% of the weightage (copium for myself)
It depends...for me personally chem cycle was tuff because I have bad memory power
well in p cycle you will have mechanical engineering sciences which is a theoretical subject also u will have physics so thats why its a bit harder than c cycle
